desc: TSD is the premier dive shop on Malapascua Island and the only PADI 5 Star CD Centre. We offer boutique diving without the price, small groups with very experienced DMs and laser eyes to spot the macro! Our Instructor team is one of the most experienced you will find, with courses from beginner up IDC and Tec.

layout.text:
The pioneers of diving in Malapascua
